name: route-mappings
description: Function factory to create nested definitions of routes, with namespaces and resources support.

scripts.test:ci: npm run coverage:all && npm run report -- -r lcov
scripts.test:all: npm run test:run tests && npm run report -- -r html
scripts.coverage:all: npm run coverage -- npm run test:all
scripts.coverage:unit: npm run coverage -- npm run test:unit
